entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Havre St-Pierre
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:30 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -0.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Havre-Saint-Pierre Airport 01:55 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -0.6°C
Pressure: 100.5 kPa
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 91 %
Dewpoint: -1.9°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness this evening then snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
